attributes.action: Stop the expansion of cycle lanes in Liverpool city region.
attributes.additional_details: Stop expansion of cycle lanes in Liverpool city region
attributes.background: Stop the introduction of new cycle lanes in Liverpool city region

rejection.details:
Decisions about establishing cycle lanes is a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also contact your the Liverpool City Region directly. Find out how to contact the Liverpool City Region here: https://www.liverpoolcityregion-ca.gov.uk/contact/
